messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1355
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/10/01 2:57:52 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/10/01 2:57:52 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But I'm not going to try to force you to give up beef and buy only
organic and get rid of your teflon and plastics and all the formaldehyde
ladened things (clothes, sheets, mattresses, etc.) in your home because I
think they are also causing harm to your children.
>>


This is OT but do you have a reasonable source for organic or minimally
processed materials. I am looking for a matress pad for dd's very
uncomfortable bed.

TIA NICKI~ who does eat 98% organically and trys her best to live
chemically free.
